attributes.action: Take South Africa off the Red List
attributes.additional_details: UK residents with family in South Africa have been unable to see loved ones during these difficult times of Covid and unrest in South Africa. Sons and daughters have been unable to visit aging or sick parents, grandparents have not been able to meet new grandchildren and people aren’t able to benefit from family support. The cost of Hotel Quarantine makes a trip to reconnect with family completely unaffordable.
attributes.background: We would like South Africa to be taken off the Red List or remove mandatory Hotel Quarantine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Remove South Africa from the travel 'Red List'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589382
